p: I'm Ayse (pronounced like this). I am a mixed-methods researcher with a background in human-computer interaction and education. I am passionate about designing physical spaces, such as museum exhibits, that use technology in thoughtful ways.

l: Exploring how interface design influences collaboration
Co-designing a museum exhibit with youth
Improving the usability of an internal calendar tool
Evaluating visitor experiences in a museum exhibit
Understanding user journeys using IDE log data
